command.description: Recalls the previous REPL command from history.
command.name: Previous REPL Command

command.description: Recalls the next REPL command from history.
command.name: Next REPL Command

command.description: Compiles the file and changes focus to the REPL.
command.name: Compile + Switch

command.description: Compiles the file. Does not change the focus to the REPL.
command.name: Compile

action.label: &Compile File + Switch
action.tooltip: Compile file and switch to REPL.

action.label: &Compile File
action.tooltip: Compile file, but don't switch to REPL.

command.description: Compiles the top level form and changes focus to the REPL.
command.name: Compile Top Level + Switch

command.description: Compiles the top level form. Does not change the focus to the REPL.
command.name: Compile Top Level

action.label: &Compile Top Level + Switch
action.tooltip: Compile top-level expression and switch to REPL.

action.label: &Compile Top Level
action.tooltip: Compile top-level expression, but don't switch to REPL.

command.description: Comments out or removes commenting out
command.name: Commenting

command.description: Jump forward to next word or sexp
command.name: Jump Forward

command.description: Jump backward to previous word or sexp
command.name: Jump Back

command.description: Expands the selection to the next outer atom/s-expression
command.name: Expand Selection

scope.name: CuspEditorScope
scope.description: scope for key bidings only seen by Cusp editors

command.description: Finds the places where this function is called.
command.name: Find Callers

command.description: Finds the functions this function calls.
command.name: Find Callees

command.description: Looks up the symbol in LispDoc.
command.name: LispDoc lookup

command.description: Looks up the symbol in HyperSpec.
command.name: HyperSpec lookup

action.label: &Macroexpand-1
action.tooltip: Performs a single macro-expansion on the current expression.

action.label: &Macroexpand-all
action.tooltip: Performs a full macro-expansion on the current expression.

fontDefinition.label: Lisp compare text font
fontDefinition.description: The Lisp compare text font is used by Lisp compare/merge tools.
